fields.name: Showerless (Passive):
fields.value: Too busy scrolling on your phone to take a shower, visitors may be deterred by the stench and have a 50% chance to be roleblocked instead when trying to visit you.

fields.name: Alternate Account (Passive):
fields.value: At the end of the Night phase, one of your several dozen alternate accounts gets the host to report back to you! You receive 10 host-picked messages of that phase from the Evil faction's chat.

fields.name: #Cancelled (1x, Charge 120%):
fields.value: Choose a player that scored lower than you the prior Evening phase. Thinking they're a bad person, you scroll through their entire social media history. When done, you publicly doxx their name, role, evening scores, and actions (both day and night).

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Get a life! (Become a valuable member of your community and see Town win the game.)
